page.title: 05LIHOU ISLAND-THE RESIDENTS
page.content: Mr.and Mrs.Robin Borwick live on{Lihou {Island}with one horse,one donkey,a peacock and peahen,4 chickens and 31 baby ducks. In September 1985 they are going to have a baby donkey. They travel round the island in a red jeep. The house is very old fashioned.It has white windows and in one of the bedrooms they have a four poster bed. They also have a swimming pool. Mrs. Borwick makes{dolls houses}and little dolls. One day after school I went to see them. The dolls houses are very valuable and Mrs. Borwick told me how to make them. She makes the little dolls out of cardboard,cotton reels and wool. Some houses she buys and some she makes. It takes 2 days to make one and a week to make a dolls house. By{Claire Chipperfield
